author: anurpeljto
message: chore(curriculum): update asserts in magazine workshop steps 14-15-16 (#60682)

files.patch:
@@ -18,13 +18,13 @@ Instead of a series of coding challenges, people will be in their code editor pa
 You should add a sixth `p` element to the `.text` element.
 
 ```js
-assert(document.querySelectorAll('.text p')?.length === 7)
+assert.lengthOf(document.querySelectorAll('.text p'), 7);
 ```
 
 Your sixth `p` element should have the provided text.
 
 ```js
-assert(document.querySelectorAll('.text p')?.[6]?.innerText === 'Instead of a series of coding challenges, people will be in their code editor passing one test after another, quickly building up a project. People will get into a real flow state, similar to what they experience when they build the required projects at the end of each certification. They\'ll get that sense of forward progress right from the beginning. And freeCodeCamp will be a much smoother experience.')
+assert.equal(document.querySelectorAll('.text p')?.[6]?.innerText, 'Instead of a series of coding challenges, people will be in their code editor passing one test after another, quickly building up a project. People will get into a real flow state, similar to what they experience when they build the required projects at the end of each certification. They\'ll get that sense of forward progress right from the beginning. And freeCodeCamp will be a much smoother experience.');
 ```
 
 # --seed--
